  1: <?php
  2: /**
  3:  * Ce fichier est développé pour la gestion de la librairie Mélanie2
  4:  * Cette Librairie permet d'accèder aux données sans avoir à implémenter de couche SQL
  5:  * Des objets génériques vont permettre d'accèder et de mettre à jour les données
  6:  *
  7:  * ORM M2 Copyright © 2017  PNE Annuaire et Messagerie/MEDDE
  8:  *
  9:  * This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
 10:  * it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
 11:  * the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
 12:  * (at your option) any later version.
 13:  *
 14:  * This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
 15:  * but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
 16:  * MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
 17:  * GNU General Public License for more details.
 18:  *
 19:  * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
 20:  * along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
 21:  */
 22: namespace LibMelanie\Config;
 23: 
 24: /**
 25:  * Configuration du mapping vers Melanie2
 26:  *
 27:  * @author PNE Messagerie/Apitech
 28:  * @package Librairie Mélanie2
 29:  * @subpackage Config
 30:  */
 31: class MappingMelanie {
 32:     // Mapping SQL
 33:     /**
 34:      * Tables associées aux objets
 35:      * @var array
 36:      */
 37:     public static $Table_Name = [];
 38: 
 39:     /**
 40:      * Clés primaires des tables Melanie2
 41:      * @var array
 42:     */
 43:     public static $Primary_Keys = [];
 44: 
 45:     /**
 46:      * Gestion du mapping entre les données et les champs de la base de données
 47:      * need name, type if != string, format for datetime (user constants)
 48:      * @var array
 49:     */
 50:     public static $Data_Mapping = [];
 51:     
 52:     /**
 53:      * Initialisation du mapping
 54:      */
 55:     public static function Init() {
 56:       // Init Tables Name
 57:       self::$Table_Name = [
 58:           "EventMelanie"                => "kronolith_events",
 59:           "HistoryMelanie"          => "horde_histories",
 60:           "TaskMelanie"                 => "nag_tasks",
 61:           "ContactMelanie"          => "turba_objects",
 62:           "EventProperties"         => "lightning_attributes",
 63:           "TaskProperties"          => "lightning_attributes",
 64:           "AttachmentMelanie"   => "horde_vfs",
 65:           "CalendarMelanie"         => "horde_datatree",
 66:           "CalendarSync"                => "kronolith_sync",
 67:           "TaskslistSync"           => "nag_sync",
 68:           "TaskslistMelanie"        => "horde_datatree",
 69:           "AddressbookMelanie"  => "horde_datatree",
 70:           "UserPrefs"                   => "horde_prefs",
 71:           "Share"                           => "horde_datatree_attributes",
 72:       ];
 73:       // Init Primary Keys
 74:       self::$Primary_Keys = [
 75:           "UserMelanie"                 => ["uid", "email"],
 76:           "EventMelanie"                => ["uid", "calendar"],
 77:           "HistoryMelanie"          => ["uid", "action"],
 78:           "TaskMelanie"                 => ["uid", "taskslist"],
 79:           "ContactMelanie"          => ["uid", "addressbook"],
 80:           "EventProperties"         => ["event", "calendar", "user", "key"],
 81:           "TaskProperties"          => ["task", "taskslist", "user", "key"],
 82:           "AttachmentMelanie"   => ["path", "name"],
 83:           "CalendarMelanie"         => ["id", "owner", "group"],
 84:           "CalendarSync"                => ["token", "calendar"],
 85:           "TaskslistSync"           => ["token", "taskslist"],
 86:           "TaskslistMelanie"        => ["id", "owner", "group"],
 87:           "AddressbookMelanie"  => ["id", "owner", "group"],
 88:           "UserPrefs"                   => ["user", "scope", "name"],
 89:           "Share"                           => ["object_id", "name"],
 90:       ];
 91:       // Init Data Mapping
 92:       self::$Data_Mapping = [
 93:           // Gestion de l'utilisateur : objet UserMelanie
 94:           "UserMelanie" => [
 95:               "uid"                    => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_uid', "uid"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
 96:               "fullname"               => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_cn', "cn"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
 97:               "name"                   => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_displayname', "displayname"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
 98:               "email"                  => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_mel_principal', "mailpr"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
 99:               "email_list"             => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_mels_list', "mail"), self::type => self::arrayLdap],
100:               "email_send"             => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_mel_emission', "mineqmelmailemissionpr"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
101:               "email_send_list"        => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_mels_emission_list', "mineqmelmailemission"), self::type => self::arrayLdap],
102:               "service"                => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_mel_service', "departmentnumber"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
103:               "password_need_change"   => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_pwd_change', "mineqpassworddoitchanger"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
104:               "shares"                 => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_mel_partages', "mineqmelpartages"), self::type => self::arrayLdap],
105:               "away_response"          => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_mel_response', "mineqmelreponse"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
106:               "internet_access_admin"  => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_mel_accesinterneta', "mineqmelaccesinterneta"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
107:               "internet_access_user"   => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_mel_accesinternetu', "mineqmelaccesinternetu"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
108:               "use_photo_ader"         => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_photo_publiader', "mineqPublicationPhotoAder"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
109:               "use_photo_intranet"     => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_photo_publiintra', "mineqPublicationPhotoIntranet"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
110:               "employee_number"        => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_employeenumber', "employeenumber"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
111:               "zone"                   => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_zone', "mineqzone"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
112:               "street"                 => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_street', "street"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
113:               "postalcode"             => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_postalcode', "postalcode"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
114:               "locality"               => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_locality', "l"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
115:               "info"                   => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_info', "info"), self::type => self::arrayLdap],
116:               "description"            => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_description', "description"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
117:               "phonenumber"            => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_phonenumber', "telephonenumber"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
118:               "faxnumber"              => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_faxnumber', "facsimiletelephonenumber"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
119:               "mobilephone"            => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_mobilephone', "mobile"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
120:               "roomnumber"             => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_roomnumber', "roomnumber"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
121:               "title"                  => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_title', "title"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
122:               "business_category"      => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_businesscat', "businesscategory"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
123:               "vpn_profile"            => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_vpnprofil', "mineqvpnprofil"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
124:               "update_personnal_info"  => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_majinfoperso', "mineqmajinfoperso"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
125:               "synchro_access_admin"   => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_mel_accessynchroa', "mineqmelaccessynchroa"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
126:               "synchro_access_user"    => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_mel_accessynchrou', "mineqmelaccessynchrou"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
127:               "server_routage"         => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_mel_routage', "mineqmelroutage"), self::type => self::arrayLdap],
128:               "mission"                => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_mission', "mineqmission"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
129:               "photo"                  => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_photo', "jpegphoto"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
130:               "gender"                 => [self::name => \LibMelanie\Ldap\Ldap::GetMap('user_gender', "gender"), self::type => self::stringLdap],
131:           ],
132:           // Gestion des préférences de l'utilisateur : objet UserPrefs
133:           "UserPrefs" => [
134:               "user"    => [self::name => "pref_uid", self::type => self::string, self::size => 255],
135:               "scope" => [self::name => "pref_scope", self::type => self::string, self::size => 16],
136:               "name"    => [self::name => "pref_name", self::type => self::string, self::size => 32],
137:               "value" => [self::name => "pref_value"],
138:           ],
139:           // Gestion des partages de l'utilisateur : objet Share
140:           "Share" => [
141:               "object_id" => [self::name => "datatree_id", self::type => self::integer],
142:               "name"            => [self::name => "attribute_key", self::type => self::string, self::size => 255],
143:               "type"            => [self::name => "attribute_name", self::type => self::string, self::size => 255],
144:               "acl"             => [self::name => "attribute_value"],
145:           ],
146:           // Gestion du calendrier : objet CalendarMelanie
147:           "CalendarMelanie" => [
148:               "id"              => [self::name => "calendar_id"],
149:               "owner"       => [self::name => "calendar_owner", self::defaut => ''],
150:               "name"            => [self::name => "calendar_name", self::defaut => ''],
151:               "ctag"            => [self::name => "calendar_ctag"],
152:               "synctoken" => [self::name => "calendar_synctoken"],
153:               "perm"            => [self::name => "perm_calendar"],
154:               "object_id" => [self::name => "datatree_id"],
155:               "group"       => [self::name => "group_uid", self::defaut => ConfigMelanie::CALENDAR_GROUP_UID],
156:           ],
157:           // Gestion de la liste de tâches : objet TaskslistMelanie
158:           "TaskslistMelanie" => [
159:               "id"              => [self::name => "task_owner"],
160:               "owner"       => [self::name => "taskslist_owner", self::defaut => ''],
161:               "name"            => [self::name => "taskslist_name", self::defaut => ''],
162:               "ctag"            => [self::name => "taskslist_ctag"],

164:               "perm"            => [self::name => "perm_taskslist"],
165:               "object_id" => [self::name => "datatree_id"],
166:               "group"       => [self::name => "group_uid", self::defaut => ConfigMelanie::TASKSLIST_GROUP_UID],
167:           ],
168:           // Gestion de la liste de contacts : objet AddressbookMelanie
169:           "AddressbookMelanie" => [
170:               "id"              => [self::name => "owner_id"],
171:               "owner"       => [self::name => "addressbook_owner", self::defaut => ''],

178:           ],
179:           // Gestion de l'historique : objet HistoryMelanie
180:           "HistoryMelanie" => [

190:           "EventMelanie" => [
